Package rpg.battle

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpg.battle.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a player character used in a particular. instance of the fight.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Player​(MyCharacter myCharacter)
      Constructor with myCharacter instance provided.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(MyCharacter myCharacter)
        Constructor with myCharacter instance provided.

        Builds a dulicate of the myCharacter instance to be used in a fight. Allowing changes to be made to these attributes in the fight without changing underlying myCharacter instance.

        Parameters:
        myCharacter - base MyCharacter instance Player is representing

    • Method Detail

      • getMyCharacter

        public MyCharacter getMyCharacter()

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()

      • getCurrentHealth

        public int getCurrentHealth()
        Get Current health.

        Returns the current health stat of this player instance.

        Returns:
        int health of player

      • getCurrentStamina

        public int getCurrentStamina()
        Get Current stamina.

        Returns the current stamina stat of this player instance.

        Returns:
        int stamina of player

      • getTotalHealth

        public int getTotalHealth()
        Get Total health.

        Returns the total health stat of this player instance. That being the base MyCharacter instance's health.

        Returns:
        int health of player

      • getTotalStamina

        public int getTotalStamina()
        Get Total stamina.

        Returns the total stamina stat of this player instance. That being the base MyCharacter instance's stamina.

        Returns:
        int stamina of player

      • getHitChance

        public int getHitChance()
        Get hitChance.

        Returns the hit chance stat of this player instance.

        Returns:
        int hitChance of player

      • getDefense

        public int getDefense()
        Get defense.

        Returns the defense stat of this player instance.

        Returns:
        int defense of player

      • takeHit

        public void takeHit​(int damage)
        Changes Character Health in response to Hit.

        Subtracts damage taken from player instance's health.

        Parameters:
        damage - damage of the attack

      • makeHit

        public void makeHit()
        Changes Character Stamina in response to attacking.

        Subtracts 20 points from stamina when an attack is attempted. to simulate effort exerted attacking.

      • resetStamina

        public void resetStamina()
        resets stamina to max when needed.

        Used when player Defends(resting) or exhausts all stamina.

      • heal

        public void heal()
        Slightly heals Character.

        Used when player defends. Heals for 5 points unless that makes health greater then max possible, in that case, sets it to max health of character.

      • valid

        public boolean valid()
        Tests if the base MyCharacter instance has requisite attributes to start fight.

        Checks to make sure all attributes are set and name isn't empty.

        Returns:
        boolean Character ready or not
